questions.q: Name 1 kind of crop that was grown in Britain.
questions.a: Barley, oats, rye, or wheat are acceptable

questions.q: For what purpose did farmers keep animals?
questions.a: Food, transport, wool/leather clothing, fertilizer, and bone are acceptable.

questions.q: How were farmers able to continue farming in the marshlands?
questions.a: Through the use of dikes and tiles.

questions.q: How did Celtic chieftains originally get slaves?
questions.a: Taken in raids and inter-tribal warfare

questions.q: How does the adjective has to agree with the ______?
What do you use CAPPI PATSI for?
questions.a: Figuring out the prepositions you use with the accusative case

questions.q: What is the current version of SUSE Linux Enterprise?

name: Story Time
description: Questions about the story in the book

questions.q: Who's coming to visit Salvius and Rufilla?
Who cleans up instead of Domitilla?
Who are Quintus and Salvius planning on giving a gift to?
Who is Salvius honoring (where he plans on bringing a gift)?
Translate: domina donum vult sed maritus avarus est.
questions.a: The mistress wanted a gift but the maritus was greedy.
